articles.author: Isaiah Richard
articles.title: NASA Dragonfly Mission: $3.35 B Saturn Moon ‘Titan’ Exploration Now Approved - Tech Times
articles.description: NASA approves the Dragonfly mission to explore Saturn's Titan moon with a $3.35 billion budget.
articles.content:
Last week, NASA officially approved and confirmed the Dragonfly mission, which has a $3.35 billion budget for the entire mission. The mission will explore Saturn's moon Titan.
 The project was first… [+3263 chars]
